name: Húsavík Wooden Church
description: Historic wooden Lutheran church in the centre of Húsavík, built in 1907 in a distinctive Swiss-chalet style. Its white timber walls, green roof and 26-metre tower make it one of the town's most recognisable landmarks. Inside, visitors find a bright wooden interior and an altarpiece depicting the resurrection of Lazarus, creating a peaceful space for quiet reflection.

opening_hours.general: Generally open daily in daytime during the main season; hours may vary with services and events.
